channel.title: Future-Scape Need's a 24/7 Hoster! server is v 508 or 513 i forgot lol
channel.description:
The source used on this server is ScapeRune yes its that sick server with that bending. 1. Fast Computer. 2. Few Gigs of Ram. 3. Approx 20GB of computer space.(minimum) 4. Good/Fast internet Connection. 5. Run the server 24/7 which means you can not turn you computer off and close the server window.(Closest person to 24/7 will have a higher chance of becoming the hoster)
Rewards: 1. Owner Status :eek: 2. The feel of hosting your own GAME! cmon ppl thats so ftw! :eek: 3. Have fun on the server and feel POWERFUL and ALMIGHTY. :eek:
So come on people help us become a awesome server! :D :D :D
SORRY IF THIS IS IN THE WRONG SECTION PLEASE MOVE IT TO THE RIGHT ONE IF ITS IN THE WRONG ONE but the topic says Server Help and this is a CRY for HELP!!
OH sht!! i just remebered theres a thing u goa read before posting and it says wat this section holds but i really honestly dont know were to post a hosting app so i will leave this here for like a staff person to move it or for some one to reply and say were to move it to :D

The source used on this server is ScapeRune yes its that sick server with that bending.

  1. Fast Computer.

  2. Few Gigs of Ram.

  3. Approx 20GB of computer space.(minimum)

  4. Good/Fast internet Connection.

  5. Run the server 24/7 which means you can not turn you computer off and close the server window.(Closest person to 24/7 will have a higher chance of becoming the hoster)

                                             Rewards:

  6. Owner Status :eek:

  7. The feel of hosting your own GAME! cmon ppl thats so ftw! :eek:

  8. Have fun on the server and feel POWERFUL and ALMIGHTY. :eek:

So come on people help us become a awesome server!
